name: Cyrelstriang
description:
You're pining for your beautiful next-door neighbor, but there's no way they'll ever notice you. Unless you get help from your other next-door neighbor, who may be a witch or a mad inventor or both.

A Twine mashup of Cyrano de Bergerac, the Pygmalion and Galatea myth, Vertigo (1958), and a dash of Metropolis (1927), with an all-genderless cast.
